# ConnectInChat

### Features

- üöÄ Dive into the future of instant communication with ConnectInChat, a web chat application built using React and Firebase!
- üåê Explore ConnectInChat at [connectinchat.web.app](https://connectinchat.web.app).
- üîë Join with ease - Sign in effortlessly using your Google account.
- üåç A global gathering - Connect with a worldwide community in our single, vibrant public chat room.
- ‚úÖ Enhanced user experience - Enjoy a feature-packed chat environment with added username display, real-time message timestamps, and user verification mark.
- üîó Interactive links - Now, links become clickable, making it easier than ever to share and access resources.
- üóëÔ∏è Message control - Take charge of your conversations by giving users the ability to delete their own messages. It's all about maintaining control and privacy.
